name: My figure collection customizable Dark Theme
description:
Customizable 'My Figure Collection' Theme, works on http://myfigurecollection.net/ site. I'ts possible to: pick font, background, and border colors; and also add a custom background image or leave the background as a solid color.

Thanks for visiting, tell your friends.
additional_info:
- Renamed from "My figure collection Dark Theme" to: "My figure collection customizable Dark Theme".
- Added  new features, color pickers for background, font, and borders, plus an option to add a custom image background.
